channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1317; 06:36PM; 1623 N Mariposa Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/45YIHoN; East Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN 70 Firefighters extinguished the fire in 34 minutes. They contained the fire primarily to the unit of origin on the 2nd floor with some extension up the wall to the 3rd floor unit but not inside the unit itself. There are two occupants of the unit being assessed for possible smoke inhalation Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E203 E220 E227 E229 E235 E3 E35 E41 E52 E56 E82 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM14 HR3 RA20 RA52 RA56 RA803 RA835 T20 T27 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1317; 06:02PM; 1623 N Mariposa Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/45YIHoN; East Hollywood; [Corrected Alert] Three story (Pre-43) center hall apartment building with light smoke showing upon LAFD arrival. Firefighters initiated an offensive attack and located heavy smoke compartmentalized behind a Ponet (fire) door. They created a hose lay behind the door and made entry to find fire in one unit. Two additional task forces requested. ; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E203 E220 E227 E229 E235 E3 E35 E41 E52 E56 E82 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM14 HR3 RA20 RA52 RA56 RA803 RA835 T20 T27 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0016; 12:50AM; 2202 N Thomas St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rl1I5Q; Lincoln Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 50 firefighters extinguished the fire in 31 minutes with no injuries reported. An aggressive interior attack ensured the fire was contained to the unit of origin and prevented from extending into the attached units. American Red Cross was notified to provide immediate assistance to the six displaced residents.Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E16 E2 E201 E202 E47 EM1 RA2 RA801 SQ21 T1 T2 T9; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0016; 12:19AM; 2202 N Thomas St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rl1I5Q; Lincoln Heights; One story fourplex with fire through the roof in one unit. Firefighters are in the offensive mode with additional resources enroute. ; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E16 E2 E201 E202 E47 EM1 RA2 RA801 SQ21 T1 T2 T9; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Technical Rescue; INC#1213; 05:29PM; 20640 W Valerio St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46dAbC3; #Winnetka; Firefighters responded for an adult male who appears to have fallen (or jumped?) from a bridge, into the flood control channel at least 15 feet below. Firefighters took a rigid stretcher (called a litter basket) and secured the conscious patient. To get the patient up to street level, firefighters used ropes/lashing and a ladder, in a rescue maneuver called a "moving ladder slide," where the litter basket is fastened to the ladder and then the ladder (with patient) is passed along a line of firefighters to overcome challenging terrain. The patient was safely brought back up to street level and transported to a local trauma center in serious condition. Nothing further. ; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E104 E273 E72 E73 EM15 HR3 RA104 RA72 T73 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0967; 02:58PM; 5504 S Central Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/44UBYuD; #CentralAlameda; Firefighters found fire burning in one unit of a row of commercials. Thirty-six firefighters performed a coordinated attack on the fire between interior fire attack and rooftop ventilation to contain the fire to the unit-of-origin and extinguish the flames in 12 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 E14 E21 E221 E233 E33 RA33 RA833 SQ21 T21 T33; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0967; 02:46PM; 5504 S Central Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PGIZLr; #CentralAlameda; One-story row of commercials with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E14 E21 E221 E233 E33 RA33 RA833 SQ21 T21 T33; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#0690; 11:46AM; 3993 S La Brea Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Rpuf50; #BaldwinHills/#Crenshaw; Firefighters responded to find a single-vehicle rollover, with one patient trapped. Firefighters deployed hydraulic rescue tools to free the patient from the wreckage. One adult male was transported in critical condition. LAPD Inc #1779. Nothing further.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E261 E294 E34 E68 EM11 HR3 RA68 RA94 T61 T94; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1150; 03:44PM; 5558 W Edgewood Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Zkc16C; #MidWilshire; Two-story home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E229 E26 E261 E29 E294 E61 E68 EM9 RA34 RA41 RA829 SO1 T29 T61 T94; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire #4thStreetFire 09/12/2023 INC#0896

item.description: Update #4thStreetFire Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0896; 02:13PM; 329 E 4th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r9PrB2; #Downtown; With 125 LAFD Firefighters assigned in defensive operations, this incident, known as the "4th Street Fire" is now considered a Major Emergency. Heavy fire continues among dense storage on the second and third floors of the 5,000 square foot three-story (plus basement) commercial building of masonry construction (2 floors originally of 'office' space above first floor commercial). No injury. No evacuation. Two LAFD Public Information Officers (Captain Erik Scott / Captain Adam Van Gerpen) are available at Media Staging: 4th Street & San Pedro Street.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM21 CM22 CM40 CM42 E1 E10 E11 E17 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E227 E235 E27 E3 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 PI1 PI2 RA10 RA211 RA25 RA803 RA827 RA9 RI200 SO1 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T2 T27 T3 T35 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey
